channel.title: Earthscape V.1-V.3 REPOST
channel.description: [size=36pt]THIS IS THE WORST SOURCE YOU WILL EVER COME ACROSS, IT WAS MY FIRST ATTEMPT, AND IT IS HORRIBLE.[/size] [center][u][b]What Is Earthscape?[/b][/u] Earthscape is a project i started a while ago, while i had just begun coding runescape private servers. It is a balanced source, with great pking, and also a manageable economy. I was aiming for something that looked earth-like, hence the home in Version one, the training in version 1 and 2, and the pk area, which has been maintained through all 3 versions released so far. It has a unique way of runecrafting, which i have totally integrated into the source, it seems as tho it was a part of the runescape we now emulate. [u][b]What Is So Great About Earthscape?[/b][/u] Earthscape isn't one of those server like deltascape, which will become immensely famous, as i only use it to test certain codes. Earthscape has the following Features - Version 1 - Never Before Seen Home The portals used, had never been used before. Summoning A Never Before Seen Pking Area Never Before Seen Shops New Wyvern Area New dagganoth Area Wishing Well Custom Items (viewable only with silabgarza client) Version 2 - Version 2 was more 1.5, as i only coded a new home, and added more commands,etc New home Fixed some glitches Added a News System New Vengeance Version 3 - Added scoreboard (players online) to home New Veng Complete summoning I cleaned up the client class, along with some others. 2 New Training Area's (::train & ::train2) New Shops I tried to utilize the advice the reaper gave to me, so the training areas are less crowded, i tried it for the shops, but..it didnt really work out. All new runecrafting, totally intergrated into the server, there isnt even an object placed. ( no picture ) For version 3 i created a new vengeance() method, so it freed up some space in the parseincomingpackets method. Which means, less work for you :) [u][b]Downloads [/b][/u] If you dont want to see pictures, etc just download here - [URL=http://uppit.com/VDDG8M]Version 1[/URL] [URL=http://uppit.com/XXFAWK]Version 2[/URL] [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?jtj22mjzi2y]Version 3 [/url] [URL=http://sgclient.tk] SilabGarza Client ( To view Custom Items )[/URL] [u][b]Version One[/b][/u] This is version 1 of earthscape Normal Commands - [CODE]armorhelp pest rep pc gopc tz home client agility train wyvern dag defender jad wc pk dragons kqueen fish 3rdage farm slayer smith mypk gsmini starter [/CODE] Staff Commands - [CODE] testskull gamecount eat alert lupdate pnpc giveadmin givemod giveowner Demote testminigame noclip xrichie xteleall pickup xteletome xteleto god godoff modzone membership suggest master clicks ipban banuser unban macrowarn getpass setlvls [/CODE] HOME [IMG]http://i333.photobucket.com/albums/m395/Xoo_0_ooX/home-1.jpg[/img] PORTALS [IMG]http://i333.photobucket.com/albums/m395/Xoo_0_ooX/portals.jpg[/img] DaganoTH [IMG]http://i333.photobucket.com/albums/m395/Xoo_0_ooX/dags.jpg[/img] RunecraftinG [IMG]http://i333.photobucket.com/albums/m395/Xoo_0_ooX/runecrafting.jpg[/img] ShopS [IMG]http://i333.photobucket.com/albums/m395/Xoo_0_ooX/shops-1.jpg[/img] TheivE [IMG]http://i333.photobucket.com/albums/m395/Xoo_0_ooX/theive-3.jpg[/img] - DownloaD - [url=http://uppit.com/VDDG8M]UppIT! Free File Hosting[/url] [u][b]Version 2[/b][/u] More like v 1.5 Normal Commands - [CODE]armorhelp pest rep pc gopc tz home client agility train wyvern dag defender jad wc pk dragons kqueen fish 3rdage farm slayer smith mypk gsmini starter [/CODE] Staff Commands - [CODE] testskull gamecount eat alert lupdate pnpc giveadmin givemod giveowner Demote testminigame noclip xrichie xteleall pickup xteletome xteleto god godoff modzone membership suggest master clicks ipban banuser unban macrowarn getpass setlvls [/CODE] HOME [IMG]http://i333.photobucket.com/albums/m395/Xoo_0_ooX/untitled-4.jpg[/img] - DownloaD - [url=http://uppit.com/XXFAWK]UppIT! Free File Hosting[/url] [u][b] Version 3[/b][/u] For features, see above. For Commands, see above. Home - [IMG]http://i333.photobucket.com/albums/m395/Xoo_0_ooX/Sk1ttlezrule43vno-ipinfo0003-1.png[/img] Train 2 - [IMG]http://i333.photobucket.com/albums/m395/Xoo_0_ooX/Sk1ttlezrule43vno-ipinfo0000.png[/img] Train - [IMG]http://i333.photobucket.com/albums/m395/Xoo_0_ooX/Sk1ttlezrule43vno-ipinfo0001-1.png[/img] Shops - [IMG]http://i333.photobucket.com/albums/m395/Xoo_0_ooX/Sk1ttlezrule43vno-ipinfo0002-1.png[/img] Vengeance - [IMG]http://i333.photobucket.com/albums/m395/Xoo_0_ooX/asas-1.jpg[/img] [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?jtj22mjzi2y]DOWNLOAD[/url] [b][u]I AM RAZOR FROM RUNESTYLE[/u][/b] [b][u]I AM RASH FROM MOPAR[/u][/b] [b][u]I AM AMIXROID FROM google[/u][/b]

[quote=“Project Epic, post:1, topic:372699”][quote author=Ix Soulcist xI link=topic=468415.msg3425025#msg3425025 date=1291848914]
This is not the worse source release that I’ve seen. This isn’t that bad at all, I love the classic server’s.
[/quote]

…how is this classic good first attempt but today im already in a bad mood and it made me barf… terribly sorry.[/quote]

I beleive he meant ‘classic’ to be ‘Czar’

Ah, its fine.

item.title: Earthscape V.1-V.3 REPOST
item.dc:creator: @rash Rash
item.description:
@rash wrote:

[size=36pt]THIS IS THE WORST SOURCE YOU WILL EVER COME ACROSS, IT WAS MY FIRST ATTEMPT, AND IT IS HORRIBLE.[/size]

[center]What Is Earthscape?
Earthscape is a project i started a while ago, while i had just begun coding runescape private servers.
It is a balanced source, with great pking, and also a manageable economy.
I was aiming for something that looked earth-like, hence the home in Version one, the training in version 1 and 2, and the pk area, which has been maintained through all 3 versions released so far.
It has a unique way of runecrafting, which i have totally integrated into the source, it seems as tho it was a part of the runescape we now emulate.

What Is So Great About Earthscape?
Earthscape isn’t one of those server like deltascape, which will become immensely famous, as i only use it to test certain codes.

Earthscape has the following Features -

Version 1 -

Never Before Seen Home
The portals used, had never been used before.
Summoning
A Never Before Seen Pking Area
Never Before Seen Shops
New Wyvern Area
New dagganoth Area
Wishing Well
Custom Items (viewable only with silabgarza client)

Version 2 -

Version 2 was more 1.5, as i only coded a new home, and added more commands,etc
New home
Fixed some glitches
Added a News System
New Vengeance

Version 3 -
Added scoreboard (players online) to home
New Veng
Complete summoning
I cleaned up the client class, along with some others.
2 New Training Area’s (::train & ::train2)
New Shops
I tried to utilize the advice the reaper gave to me, so the training areas are less crowded, i tried it for the shops, but…it didnt really work out.
All new runecrafting, totally intergrated into the server, there isnt even an object placed. ( no picture )
For version 3 i created a new vengeance() method, so it freed up some space in the parseincomingpackets method. Which means, less work for you

Downloads
If you dont want to see pictures, etc just download here -
Version 1
Version 2
Version 3
SilabGarza Client ( To view Custom Items )
